name: Srv-templates
tagline: Industry server configuration and setup files
body:
# Server-templates
Welcome to our server configuration templates.

### Log
23 April 13 -- Added base Varnish .vcl files


```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
